IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Premier Student Housing for Louisiana State University at Alexandria
IRS990.Desc: Promote university through student life and on-campus housing.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Form 990 is prepared from Board approved audited financial statements. The completed Form 990 is reviewed by the LSUA Foundation Board, the LSUA Foundation President and the LSUA Foundation Accountant

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization makes its governing documents, conflicts of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public upon request.
The Organization did not change its audit oversight process during the year.
